---
name: advanced-skill
description: Use this to deploy the project using Firebase tools and MCP integration
version: 1.0.0
disable-model-invocation: true
allowed-tools:
  - Bash
  - Write
---

# Advanced Skill

This skill handles project deployment using the `firebase:deploy` MCP tool.

## Usage

```bash
/advanced-skill
```

## Example

```bash
npm run build && npm run deploy
```
